channel.title: Critical-View on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Critical-View on The Guyana Brief

item.title: SOCU Raids Shut-Down Business, Finds Less Money Than What's In Your NIS Account
item.description: Twenty SOCU officers, one sniffer dog, and a building that's been closed since 2024. Plus: Government quietly paying US$90,000 a month to American lobby firms.
